## EncodeOptions type

Configures assets encoding.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EncodeOptions = {
    root: string;
    main: {
        suffix: string;
        specs: EncodeSpecMap;
    };
    cover: {
        suffix: string;
        specs: EncodeSpecMap;
    } | null;
    safe: {
        suffix: string;
        types: (string | Readonly<RegExp>)[];
        specs: EncodeSpecMap;
    } | null;
    dense: {
        suffix: string;
        factor: number;
        specs: EncodeSpecMap;
    } | null;
};
```
**References:** [EncodeSpecMap](./imgit.encodespecmap.md)
